premises_used.prover9_expression: (-(investigates(Compliance, Procurement) -> (-(rejects(Management, Material) | (orders(Procurement, Furniture) -> -receives(Warehouse, Furniture))) -> escalates(Procurement, Management))) -> sanctions(Management, Procurement))
premises_used.natural: If it is not true that Compliance investigating Procurement leads to the situation where, unless Management rejects the material or furniture ordering causes non-receipt, Procurement escalates to Management, then Management sanctions Procurement.
Management does not sanction Procurement.

steps.natural: If Compliance investigates Procurement, then under the condition that neither Management rejects the material nor does ordering furniture by Procurement result in non-receipt by the Warehouse, Procurement escalates to Management.

premises_used.natural: Either Compliance investigates Procurement or Internal Audit audits Procurement.

premises_used.prover9_expression: (investigates(Compliance, Procurement) -> (-(rejects(Management, Material) | (orders(Procurement, Furniture) -> -receives(Warehouse, Furniture))) -> escalates(Procurement, Management)))
premises_used.natural: If Compliance investigates Procurement, then under the condition that neither Management rejects the material nor does ordering furniture by Procurement result in non-receipt by the Warehouse, Procurement escalates to Management.

premises_used.prover9_expression: (audits(InternalAudit, Procurement) -> (-(rejects(Management, Material) | (orders(Procurement, Furniture) -> -receives(Warehouse, Furniture))) -> escalates(Procurement, Management)))
premises_used.natural: If Internal Audit audits Procurement, then provided that neither Management rejects the material nor does Procurement's furniture ordering lead to non-receipt by the Warehouse, Procurement escalates to Management.
